| HistoryText             = The [[John Paul Harrison (Earth-616)|Colonel "Hard-Butt" Harrison]] [[5th Cavalry Regiment (Earth-616)|"Harrison's Hardheads" (5th Cavalry Regiment]] of the '''Third Armored Division''' of the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|United States Army]]) was seemingly active during the [[Vietnam War]], notably .{{r|Incredible Hulk Annual #5}}

Positioned at their headquarters at [[Fort Carson]], [[Colorado (State)|Colorado]], the Third Armored Division was ordered to prevent intruders from entering in their top secret base, and were confronted by the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]].{{r|Incredible Hulk Annual #5}}
